scripts.generate:script: node ./generate-worker-script.mjs > worker.mjs && prettier worker.mjs --write && pnpm run copy:script
scripts.copy:script: cp worker.mjs wrangler-v3-polyfills && cp worker.mjs wrangler-jspm-polyfills && cp worker.mjs wrangler-unenv-polyfills && rm worker.mjs
scripts.generate: pnpm generate:script && pnpm scan:apis && pnpm run generate:table
